title: Is Urban Outfitters easy to steal from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Key point here- stealing is wrong. The only reason I would entertain a discussion of theft is to make a point to say stealing is wrong, to dissuade anyone from committing a theft of any sort and from the esoteric perspective of preventing thefts. Are you asking about stealing as in to shoplift, or do you mean internal theft of product, or are you asking about financial swindles, or do you mean some other scheme to steal from them? Each type of theft has its own modalities and risks of detection, some at the moment of the theft and others in the initial stages. It really depends on the method, the timing, the location, as well as a myriad of other factors that come into play. Perhaps if you can frame the type of theft, we can further discuss the ease of such and perhaps how you may be detected. Remember - stealing is wrong.
